EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners (1346157728.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - Test - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Dear Jacob, Thank you for the inquiry you submitted at the MBO Partners website. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. Ill be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here. <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK> You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Nicolette ___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Jacob Yahiayan [mailto:jyahiayan@continentaladvisory.com] Sent: Sunday, August 26, 2012 9:07 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Cc: Jacob Yahiayan Subject: RE: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners My family office is not a start-up and has advised as well as collaborate with several leading firms, including Bain, McKinnse, HIG Capital, IrvingPlace Capital, TDBank, and Willis to name a few. We focus on measured growth strategies. Have a read and we can discuss. Jacob H. YahiayanManaging MemberContinental Advisory Services, LLCThe Seagram Building375 Park Avenue, Suite 2607New York, New York 10152(o) 212-634-4831(m) 516-528-8749em: jyahiayan@continentaladvisory.com <mailto:jyahiayan@continentaladvisory.com>www.continentaladvisory.com <http://www.continentaladvisory.com/> From: Nicolette Taylor [mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:ntaylor@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Sunday, August 26, 2012 8:54 AM To: Jacob Yahiayan Subject: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners Dear Jacob, Thank you for taking the time to contact MBO Partners. My name is Nicolette Taylor, an MBO Partners Enrollment Manager, and I will reach out to you within one business day. If you prefer, you can easily schedule a phone appointment with me by visiting https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK <https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK>. I look forward to speaking with you!
